# cps_vote

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`cps_vote` is an R package to interface with data from the Current Population Survey (CPS) Voting and Registration Supplement, a biennial supplement to the CPS from the US Census Bureau.

## Sources

2010-2018 come straight from the [US Census Bureau](https://thedataweb.rm.census.gov/ftp/cps_ftp.html). 1972-2008 come from [ICPSR](https://www.icpsr.umich.edu/icpsrweb/ICPSR/series/24/studies).
